::KitKat::

She heard Drillbit. She opened her link,"Drillbit, home in on Land 
Mine's siganture. And hurry. They are out numbered and being 
attacked."

She ran as hard as she could and checked her scanners.  She was still 
too far away.  She still a few miles to go. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit was fine tooning his new cannon, when KitKat's message came
> over the comm. He ran out of his room, and out of the base.
> "Beast mode." He says, transforming, and drilling under ground.
> He opens a comm-link.
> "KitKat, Its DrillBit. Transmit the quordinates, so i know where to 
go."
> He says heading away from the base.
